newsitem.title: CHINA: China light industry output up 11.2 pct in Q1.
newsitem.headline: China light industry output up 11.2 pct in Q1.

text.p: China's light industry output rose 11.2 percent to 190.3 billion yuan ($22.9 billion) in the first quarter of this year compared with the same period in 1996, the Xinhua news agency said on Wednesday.
The figure was based on constant 1990 price levels, Xinhua said.

Statistics released by the China Light Industry Council showed that output of 16 out of 25 major products increased during the period, including refrigerators, washing machiners, vacuum cleaners, electric ovens and dairy products.
Output of electric fans, bicycles, aluminium products for daily use and canned food all showed declines, it said without giving further details.
